content.body: Hi folks! If someone has some time I'd appreciate some feedback on https://github.com/whatwg/console/pull/205 :) Trying to work on a spec has really made me appreciate the work you all do, too.
Sam Atkins: I've poked the editors on the PR
content.formatted_body: Sam Atkins: I've poked the editors on the PR

content.body: Great, thank you! I wasn't sure how much to hassle people.
I forgot to post my PR on directionality and the shadow DOM: https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/7424/
